poems.title: First Fig
Trees
Risk
poems.content:
And then the day came, 
when the risk 
to remain tight 
in a bud 
was more painful 
than the risk 
it took 
to Blossom.

poems.title: My Life Has Been the Poem
poems.content:
My life has been the poem I would have writ
But I could not both live and utter it.
